A similar point about incentives for aggressive bidding also would apply in our setting to the Ausubel (2004) clinching auction, which is an alternative dynamic VCG implementation in our setting. Ausubel, Cramton and Milgrom (2006) also proposed a relaxed version of revealed preference, which forces bidders to increase their final clock rounds bids in order to guaranteeÃ¢â¬Â their package from the last clock round.
